text: Alaha ne tuhanu ika jana tom paida kita phira usa ne usa vicom usa da jora bana'i'a ate use ne tuhade la'i pasu'am vica nara ate mada di'am atha nasalam paida kiti'am. Uha tuhanu tuhadi'am manvam de garabha tom bana'unda hai. Ika racana tom ba'ada dusari racana tina hanheri'am paratam de adara. Iha hi alaha tuhada raba hai, patasahi use di hai. Usa tom binham ko'i pujanayoga nahim. Phira tusi' kithom maure jande ho
